title: Looks like somebody is moving into the old bank in the Murchinson building on Front and Chestnut.  Does anybody know what?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/05/what-is-moving-into-the-old-bank-space-in-the-murchison-building-on-front-and-chestnut-streets/
